<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# Casgn Node Formatting

Represents a constant assignment (i.e. `A = 1`)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
NAME = "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
NAME = "toby"
```

## Formats with operator assignment

Before:

```ruby
NAME += "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
NAME += "toby"
```
